title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 17, ch. VI, subch. E, art. 4, pt. 830 - Extension Of Credit By Common Carriers Of Property And Of Household Goods
content:

§ 830.6 - Service charges
§ 830.7 - Discounts
§ 830.8 - Discrimination prohibited

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 17, ch. VI, subch. E, art. 4, pt. 830

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
